Container.Name: StoryScan
Container.Overview: A stunning web-based disk analyzer for Unraid that transforms storage exploration into a visual experience. Interactive treemaps, powerful search and filtering, top 10 space hogs, directory comparison, historical size tracking, and dark mode support. Finally, a disk analyzer that's as beautiful as it is functional.
Container.Category: Productivity: Tools: Other: MediaApp:Other MediaServer:Other Status:Stable

Config.Name: File Path
Config.Description: Host path to scan. Map your Unraid share(s) here.

Config.Name: Database Storage
Config.Description: Persistent storage for the SQLite database (historical scan data). Map to a location on your Unraid server to preserve history across container updates.

Config.Name: SCAN_DIRECTORIES
Config.Description: Comma-separated list of directories inside the container to scan.

Config.Name: SCAN_CRON_ENABLED
Config.Description: Enable automatic background scanning on a schedule. Set to false to disable.

Config.Name: SCAN_INTERVAL_HOURS
Config.Description: Hours between automatic scans. Accepts decimals (0.5 = 30 min). Set to 0 to disable.

Config.Name: SCAN_ON_START
Config.Description: Run an initial scan immediately when the container starts.

Config.Name: SCAN_CRON_EXPRESSION
Config.Description: Optional: override with a custom cron expression (e.g. '0 3 * * *' for 3am daily). Leave empty to use SCAN_INTERVAL_HOURS.

Config.Name: TREEMAP_MAX_NODES
Config.Description: Maximum number of items to render in the treemap.

Config.Name: TREEMAP_MAX_DEPTH
Config.Description: Maximum folder depth to display in the treemap.

Config.Name: TREEMAP_LIGHT_THRESHOLD
Config.Description: Item count below which no filtering is applied.

Config.Name: TREEMAP_MODERATE_THRESHOLD
Config.Description: Item count threshold for moderate filtering.

Config.Name: TREEMAP_AGGRESSIVE_THRESHOLD
Config.Description: Item count threshold for aggressive filtering.
